      <common_v47_0:Endorsement Value="VALID ON A3 FLIGHTS/"/>
      <common_v47_0:Endorsement Value="DATES SHOWN ONLY"/>
      <common_v47_0:Endorsement Value="NON-REFUNDABLE"/>

      <air:Brand Key="5/a/nEupSsmSaNqDFTRWVQ==" BrandID="23796" UpSellBrandID="23795" Name="GoLight" Carrier="A3">
        <air:Title Type="External" LanguageCode="EN">GoLight</air:Title>
        <air:Title Type="Short" LanguageCode="EN">GoLight</air:Title>
        <air:Text Type="MarketingConsumer" LanguageCode="EN">Choose Aegean, Europes Best Regional Airline, and discover why customers come back to us time after time.

    GoLight fares offer the best deals, with passengers to receive Aegean’s full service benefits on board and on the ground.

    - checked baggage available at a fee if required
    - hand luggage included (1 bag up to 8 kg)
    - complimentary Greek Cuisine meal and drinks on board
    - mileage accrual
    - check-in 48 hours - 30 min. before departure</air:Text>
        <air:Text Type="MarketingAgent" LanguageCode="EN">Choose Aegean, Europes Best Regional Airline, and discover why customers come back to us time after time.

    GoLight fares offer the best deals, with passengers to receive Aegean’s full service benefits on board and on the ground.

    - checked baggage available at a fee if required
    - hand luggage included (1 bag up to 8 kg)
    - complimentary Greek Cuisine meal and drinks on board
    - mileage accrual
    - check-in 48 hours - 30 min. before departure</air:Text>
        <air:Text Type="Strapline" LanguageCode="EN">The best fares, without bags</air:Text>

            <air:Text Type="Strapline" LanguageCode="EN">Check in your bags</air:Text>
            <air:Text Type="MarketingAgent" LanguageCode="EN">No checked bags are included for GoLight fares, however can be booked for an additional fee of 30 EUR (40 EUR from 01 July to 10 September).
